text.text: I started developing websites in 1995. I have since worked with various technology stacks like Perl-CGI, ColdFusion, PHP, Java/J2EE and recently NodeJS.
text.name: leftBody

text.text: My first job right out of college was doing graphic design work for print. I produced training and promotional materials and advertisements for a nationwide USAID project. Integration of technology and visual design is one of my main interests.
text.name: centerBody

text.text: Photography, video and music production work.
text.name: rightBody
